post_text: 🚀 We’re Hiring – Product Manager | Respiratory Portfolio | Product LaunchLooking for a dynamic Product Manager who can drive strategy, execution, and impactful market success. ✅ Strong product management/marketing experience in pharma or healthcare ✅ Expertise in handling launches & portfolio management ✅ Strategic thinker with execution excellence📍 Location: Gurugram 📧 Apply here: Aarti.s@head2hire.comBe a part of a team that’s redefining respiratory care and making a difference in patients’ lives. 💙 hashtag#PharmaHiring hashtag#ProductManager hashtag#RespiratoryPortfolio hashtag#ProductLaunch hashtag#HealthcareInnovation
